title: CIA Drug Ops Conspiracy
description: The title pretty much says it all for this one.  It's an old school documentary, I believe from the Reagan years, exposing how the CIA uses drugs to fund its operations beyond the budget black hole that it is able to push through congress.  It also uses this to fuel the struggles and control people in 3rd world (especially middle eastern and latin american) countries when pushing to get a government to open the borders to let our capitalist corporations come in to basically just rape and pillage the land.  God bless the USA.
